name: bokeh

params.name: model
params.description: The plot object to be added to the notebook display

params.name: scale
params.description: How tall the plot should be in the notebook as a fraction of screen height. A number between 0.1 and 1.0. The default value is 0.7.

params.name: responsive
params.description: Whether or not the plot should responsively scale to fill the width of the notebook. The default is True.

doc: Adds a Bokeh plot object to the notebook display
